name: Tit-tac-four
description:
Tic-tac-Four is a game of random rolls, making lines and happy mistakes.

[ENG]

Rules 

The objective is to be the first to have 4 tokens in line.

The game is played in a 8x8 board.

At the beginning of each turn the player will roll the dices and will receive 2 coordinates plus a set of extra moves.

The coordinates will indicate where the player can place his token, and the moves will give him extra mobility around the board.

Should the player make three rolls and not be able to place anywhere the game will end in a draw.

Additionally this game has a BOARD GAME mode when you can play this game without any rules.
